item.title: the serverless API
item.description: Building an API does come with a lot of different facets to consider. One of the greater ones is, how to run all this. Building an API implementation is a rather easy Task, most developers today have some experience with connecting with API and already had their point of contact with various technologies to fulfill this task. A much greater pain point comes in if you start to think about, how to host this implementation and make it secure.
